course.title: AI Fundamentals with Python
course.description: Learning about the basics of AI with Python and Hugging Face.

lessons.title: Quick Checklists — Pipelines, Attention, Generation
lessons.description: Compact, practical checklists to configure pipelines, reason about attention, and choose text generation settings.

lessons.title: The Attention Mechanism
lessons.description: Build intuition for self-attention, Q/K/V projections, multi-head attention, masking, and positional information in Transformers.

lessons.title: Decoders and Text Generation
lessons.description: Practical guide to causal decoders and generation strategies like greedy, beam search, top-k/top-p sampling, temperature, and penalties.

lessons.title: DreamBooth — Personalizing Text-to-Image Models
lessons.description: Fine-tune a text-to-image model on a few photos to learn a specific subject; cover dataset prep, prior preservation, training, and inference.

lessons.title: Fine-Tuning Transformer Models
lessons.description: Prepare datasets, choose an approach (full, LoRA/PEFT), configure training with the Trainer API, evaluate, and ship safely to production.

lessons.title: Hugging Face Pipeline Tasks
lessons.description: A list of all of the things you can do with a Hugging Face Transformers.

lessons.title: Text-to-Image Generation (Stable Diffusion)
lessons.description: Understand Stable Diffusion's components, schedulers, guidance scale, prompt craft, safety, and performance for text-to-image tasks.

lessons.title: Image-to-Image Transformations
lessons.description: Generate new images guided by both a textual prompt and an initial image; control fidelity with strength and guidance.

lessons.title: Installing the Hugging Face CLI
lessons.description: A brief guide on how to install the Hugging Face CLI.

lessons.title: Pipeline Basics (Hugging Face)
lessons.description: Understand Hugging Face Pipelines, tasks, model/tokenizer loading, batching, devices, and configuration for quick, production-ready inference.

lessons.title: Tokenization — From Text to Tensors
lessons.description: Learn how text becomes model-ready tensors via subword tokenization, special tokens, padding, truncation, and attention masks.

lessons.title: What is Hugging Face?
lessons.description: A quick overview of what exactly Hugging Face is.
